title: Sea bream, tomato chutney, cucumber relish and samphire
description: Try this sea bream in a light spiced batter as a starter or tapas dish - perfect with a cold glass of wine on a hot day.
ingredients: 1 large knob fresh root ginger, finely chopped
3 whole sea bream, skinned, filleted and cut into strips
2 tomatoes, skinned, deseeded and cut into strips
2 red chillies, sliced and seeds removed
small knob fresh root ginger, sliced
